source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.
source_objects.title: 3D & Animation

items.title: After Effects Template:Photo Slideshow Intro
items.headline: A comprehensive course of creating a Photo Slideshow Opener template
objectives_summary: Creating Photo Slideshow in Adobe After Effects
Importing Footage to Adobe After effects
Creating Pre Compositions for animation

items.title: The Lumion 2021 Course - Create Realistic Photos and Videos
items.headline: Create Photorealistic Renderings and Cinematic videos with Lumion.
objectives_summary: Create realistic photos and video renderings with Lumion.
Learn the essentials of the main tools, settings and effects that the Lumion offers.
Learn how to import external 3D models into Lumion, that were made in other softwares, like Revit, Sketchup and 3Ds.

items.title: Recap & Regard3D for Reality Capture and 3D scanning

visible_instructors.title: AulaGEO Academy

visible_instructors.job_title: Specialists in GIS - BIM - LAND and Smart process training

items.headline: Create, clean and export 3D models and pointcloud files using Autodesk Recap and open software model
objectives_summary: Crate 3d model from images
create point cloud model from images
clean point cloud model

items.title: Verified Views for Planning Applications

visible_instructors.title: Jamie Cardoso
visible_instructors.name: Jamie
visible_instructors.job_title: Expert in 3D Lighting, Rendering, 3ds Max, V-Ray, VR, PS

items.headline: Verified Views+3d+3ds max + 3d Rendering + V-Ray+3d Lighting+Shading/Texturing + 3dsmax+ Vray+ Photoshop+Planning
objectives_summary: Users will learn to Create and submit Verified Views for Planning Applications, using 3ds Max, V-Ray and Photoshop
Learn to use photography in the process of creating Verified Views
Learn to use the Survey Data from the Surveyor

items.title: Creating Stylized Lava Cave Game Environment
items.headline: 3Ds Max, ZBrush, Substance Painter and Unreal Engine 4
objectives_summary: How to create a stylized 3d scene.

items.title: Making a Flat Motion Graphics Project
items.headline: Create a complete flat graphic motion graphic project and learn how to use the most widely used techniques in this style
objectives_summary: Making a flat motion graphics project
Draw Flat design graphics by shape layer in after effects
Animate a comfortable and professional scenes

items.title: Thanos vs Deadpool Eng - GOLD PACK - Sculpting in Zbrush
items.headline: Course creation of a 3D model digital sculpture in Zbrush of the fight between Thanos and Deadpool for Lady Death
objectives_summary: At the end of the course the student will understand what is the production process (Pipeline) for digital sculptures, will understand how to land an idea of sculpture and will develop the model in its phases

items.title: Emotions and Expressions (Draw Better Faces)
items.headline: Learn to draw accurate faces by understanding the emotions behind them and how to make a character expression sheet
objectives_summary: Learn what points of tension on the face are and how to identify them
Identify the four basic human emotions and learn the facial movements of each one
Learn what a facial expression model sheet is

items.title: Travel Mobile App Animation In After Effects
items.headline: User Interface Interface Animation
objectives_summary: Ps file. Organize layers for animation
Import in After Effects. How to correctly import a Ps file for further animation
Animation in After Effects. I'll walk you through the process of animation of Sign in. Add a background to the scene and prepare the animation for export to the GIF

items.title: How to UV Unwrap Any Model in Blender 2.8
items.headline: UV Unwrapping sucks, so if you need help, you're not alone...let's figure this out together.
objectives_summary: How to UV unwrap objects in Blender using my 5-step, battle-tested, workflow.

items.title: Blender 2.8 for 3D Printing - Intro to Pro Techniques
items.headline: Become a Flexible 3D Print Designer
objectives_summary: How to build "Flexible" Design Projects
How to Design for No Rafts & No Supports
Bool Tool - Blender Add On

items.title: Secrets of 3D Modeling in Blender: Game Assets and Rendering
items.headline: This 3D Modeling Course Teaches You the Fundamentals of 3D Modeling for Games and 3D Modeling for Renders in Blender.
objectives_summary: Solid foundation of 3D modeling for video games and rendering.
How to use Blender, the completely free 3D graphics software.

items.title: Large Game Environment Creation - UE5 Tutorial Course

items.headline: Learn how a professional environment artist works when creating large environments for games.
objectives_summary: Learn how to build large environments in Unreal Engine 5
Learn how to model in Maya 2022
Learn how to create procedural materials in Substance Designer

items.title: Make 3 Beautiful 3D Wallpapers in Cinema 4D - Vol 3
items.headline: Create 3 beautiful wallpapers in Cinema 4D in less than 1 hour.
objectives_summary: Create beautiful wallpapers in Cinema 4D.
Understand the power of simplicity in Cinema 4D.
Apply their new knowledge in different Cinema 4D projects.

items.title: Guerilla VFX for Indie Film Makers
items.headline: Learn to take a VFX project from start to end as a solo artist for your own films
objectives_summary: You will learn how to  be more confident on approaching a vfx heavy shot where you are the sole person with the responsibility to finish the shot.
Learn to do Key for a green screen footage
Creating a basic matte painting landscape in photoshop
